predicate.note: Frames file for 'foresee' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'see'.

roleset.name: see into the future

example.name: very boring
example.text: Mr. Lego said the company foresees the need for a major boost in new-generation capability throughout the 1990s.
example.arg: the need for a major boost in new-generation capability throughout the 1990s

roleset.note: Heheheh, "Mr. Lego." Ah, the mental images.
